# pythetatools
pythetatools is a Python package providing post-fit analysis and drawing tools for P-theta analysis outputs.

# Installation
To install the package run:
pip install -e "/local_path/pythetatools/"

# Documentation
The documentation is automatically generated by Sphinx. It can be found here:

pythetatools/docs/_build/html/index.html

### Updating the Documentation

To regenerate the documentation, run the following commands from the `docs` folder:

```bash
# Remove old auto-generated .rst files
rm pythetatools*.rst

# Generate new .rst files from the source code
sphinx-apidoc -o . --separate ../pythetatools

# Build the HTML documentation
make html
